name: Godot Arena
description:
The Godot game engine has been infected with viruses. Grab your Open Source Sword and defeat them all.

There are 2 modes:

  • Arena: Defeat the final boss and save the Godot game engine.
  • Survival: How many waves can you survive?

Objects:

  • Health Potion: Restores 1 hp.
  • Sword Fragment: Increases the size of the Open Source Sword. Is dropped by enemies with blades.

Controls:

  • Move: w/a/s/d
  • Attack: Left mouse button
  • Dash: Right mouse button
